body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Nicholas Brown from Sweet Treats Bakery. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Nicole Rodriguez. I'm really angry because I received an email from your bakery with my personal information exposed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m so sorry to hear that, Nicole. We take privacy concerns very seriously. Could you please provide me with your email address so we can look into this matter?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email address is nicole.rodriguez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Nicole. Can you also provide the phone number associated with your account? This will help us verify your account details.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is five five five one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for the information. I’ve noted these details and we'll investigate this issue immediately. I apologize again for the inconvenience this has caused you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just hope this is resolved quickly. This is really concerning.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Nicole. We will prioritize this issue to ensure it doesn’t happen again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Nicole. Thank you for your time and patience. Have a great day.
